  • Customs & Duties: International buyers may be responsible for customs duties or taxes as per their countryâ€™s regulations.

settings.heading: Warranty & Returns
settings.content:
At Kesh Gemstone, we are committed to providing you with exceptional quality and service.

  • Warranty: All our jewelry is covered by a warranty against manufacturing defects. If you experience any issues related to workmanship or materials, we will repair or replace the item as needed. Please retain your purchase receipt for warranty claims.
  • Returns: We offer a 30-day return policy for unused items in their original condition and packaging. If you are not completely satisfied, you can request a return or exchange within this period. Custom-made or personalized items may not be eligible for returns unless defective.

For more details, please refer to our Warranty & Returns Policy page or contact our customer service team.

Your satisfaction is our top priority!
